get.summary: Get all officer's in the system

post.summary: Get all officers matching the supplied criteria

parameters.name: givenName
parameters.description: The given name of the person

parameters.name: surname
parameters.description: The surname of the person

parameters.name: dateOfBirth
parameters.description: The person's date of birth. Format is: DD/MM/YYYY

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: The gender of the person. Accepted values are from the set {Mand,Kvinde,Ukendt}

parameters.name: appointedDate
parameters.description: The date from which the officer title is valid

parameters.name: rankID
parameters.description: The ID of the rank to be used as a criteria

post.summary: Add a new relation to the system

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: The parent of the relation

parameters.name: child
parameters.description: The child of the relation

parameters.description: The title of the parent. I.e. {Mother,Father}

put.summary: Update an existing relation of the system

parameters.description: The parent of the relation

parameters.description: The child of the relation

parameters.name: title

post.summary: Add a new user to the system

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The unique username of the user

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The unique email of the user

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password for the user

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The date from which the user is valid. Format is: DD/MM/YYYY

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: The date on which to user is invalid. Format is: DD/MM/YYYY

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The system-role of the user, from the set {contributor, administrator, read, privileged_read}

get.summary: Get all users of the system

parameters.description: The system-role of the user, from the set {contributor, administrator, read, privileged_read}
